# Lattice Lab - llms.txt
# https://www.latticelab.io
# Learn more about llms.txt: https://llmstxt.org

> Lattice is an agentic AI lab assistant that helps teams make confident AI infrastructure decisions with grounded recommendations and full citations.

## About Lattice

Lattice runs privately on your laptop or cloud. Your data, your control. It's a desktop application that processes your curated knowledge sources and provides AI-powered research synthesis for infrastructure decisions.

## Key Features

- **Sources Panel**: Build a knowledge base from PDFs, URLs, GitHub repos, YouTube transcripts. Every recommendation links back to specific source chunks.
- **Lab Panel**: Chat with an AI research agent grounded in your sources. Get recommendations with transparent reasoning and full citations.
- **Studio Panel**: Turn AI responses into reusable artifacts. Generate comparison tables, decision memos, and export to Markdown, JSON, or CSV.
- **34 Blueprints**: Pre-configured knowledge bundles from Anthropic, AWS, Google Cloud, NVIDIA, and Azure.
- **Scenarios & Stacks**: Define workload requirements (latency, budget, compliance) and configure AI infrastructure options.

## Pricing

$99 one-time payment for lifetime access. Includes all features and future updates.

## Use Cases

- Research engineers evaluating embedding models for RAG pipelines
- Platform leads comparing LLM providers for latency, budget, and compliance
- CTOs presenting AI infrastructure strategy with credible, cited sources

## Technical Details

- Built with LangGraph-powered multi-step reasoning
- Hybrid semantic + keyword search
- Supports Claude, GPT-4, Gemini models via your own API keys
- Runs locally - data never leaves your machine
